class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute
class.query: from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute institute where institute.name = :name and institute.activityStatus != 'Disabled'

select institute.id, count(distinct user.id) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute institute join institute.departments dept join dept.users user where institute.id in (:instituteIds) group by institute.id

select institute.id, count(distinct cp.id) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.administrative.domain.Institute institute join institute.sites site join site.collectionProtocols cp where institute.id in (:instituteIds) group by institute.id
